name: Saltford
role_in_state: Primary salt hub and river-port supplying ritual reagents
economy_niches: evaporative salt pans and salt refining
processing/curing of ritual reagents using saline methods
culture_adjustments: Stronger merchant-guild control; apprenticeship over kinship for crafts
Seasonal migrant workforce peaks tied to salt-harvest windows
Pragmatic purification rites centered on salt use in daily ritual
Heavier contact with Coastal Tongues traders; lexical borrowings
constraints: Depends on imported reagents for high-value rituals
Guild charters restrict new entrants and mechanized expansion
Combustion/steam industry limited by legal and resource caps
notes: Key supplier for state ritual-reagent commerce and salt taxes
Labor cycles governed by state flood-calendar; travel often seasonal
Shipyards specialize in river craft, not deep-sea vessels
